channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why This 65-Year-Old Burger Chain Is Shuttering Dozens of Restaurants
The Most Shocking Innovation Failures of 2025
item.description: Inc. takes a retrospective look at this year’s most notable failures in business and innovation.

item.title: The Hidden Costs of an “Always On” Workplace Culture
item.description: When leaders are “always on,” people learn that busyness gets rewarded.

item.title: A CEO Once Told Me His Company Was Stable. Turns Out, He Was Wrong
item.description: Stability is not the same thing as longevity anymore—not even close.

item.title: 10 must-read business books from 2025
item.description: From boardrooms to startup garages, leaders need ideas that work in the real world. These 10 books offer a broader perspective on business, helping us...

item.title: New Mac for Christmas? Try these 6 apps and games with your new Apple computer
item.description: Did your Christmas morning start off with a Mac under the tree? No matter if you unwrapped a new MacBook , iMac, or Mac mini, that hardware is just th...

item.title: Scott Galloway says the key to landing jobs is be as social as possible: ‘70% of the time, the person they pick is someone with an internal advocate’
item.description: “You want to be placed in rooms of opportunities where you’re not physically there,” the NYU Stern School of Business professor said.

item.title: 3 questions for reviewing your year
item.description: For many of us, December rushes by in a blur of holiday merrymaking and gift-giving, end-of-year invoicing and accounting, and hasty planning for the ...

item.title: After U.S. debt soared to $38 trillion, the ‘easy times’ are now over as hedge funds jump into the bond market, former Treasury official warns
item.description: Hedge funds have doubled their presence in the Treasury market in the last four years.

item.title: Cisco’s top exec and Amazon’s Andy Jassy share the same hiring red flag—and it’s something that can’t be taught
item.description: It’s not what you know, or even who you know. According to Cisco’s new U.K. chief, your next promotion might hinge on your attitude.

item.title: Zillow updates its home price forecast across 400-plus housing markets
item.description: Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter . Zillow economists just published ...

item.title: Kennedy Center seeks $1 million in damages from musician who canceled performance after Trump name added to building
item.description: The law explicitly prohibits the board of trustees from making the center into a memorial to anyone else, and from putting another person’s name on th...

item.title: How to Get Product Leadership Right
item.description: Organizations need product leaders, but they don’t know what to look for. Let’s change that.

item.title: Peter Thiel and Larry Page are preparing to flee California in case the state passes a billionaire wealth tax, report says
item.description: The proposal calls for California residents worth more than $1 billion to pay a one-time tax equivalent to 5% of their assets.

item.title: The ‘internet of beings’ is the next fronteir that could change humanity and healthcare
